headline: Has Our Government Learned Its Lesson From The Afghan Withdrawal?
author: Kathleen J. Anderson

Jordan Cohen, a Defense and Foreign Policy Analyst at the CATO Institute who focuses on arms sales, said the danger surrounding the flood of weapons funneled into Ukraine is what happens to them when the war ends.

However, with the war in Ukraine lasting longer than ‘military experts’ claimed and increasing demand to send more assistance, one has to ask if our government has learned its lesson from the Afghan withdrawal.
